ud8.6:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava magadhesu carikam caramano mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim yena pataligamo tadavasari.
ud8.6:1.4: “bhagava kira magadhesu carikam caramano mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim pataligamam anuppatto”ti.
ud8.6:1.5: Atha kho pataligamiya upasaka yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu.
ud8.6:1.6: Ekamantam nisinna kho pataligamiya upasaka bhagavantam etadavocum:
ud8.6:2.1: Atha kho pataligamiya upasaka bhagavato adhivasanam viditva utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva yenavasathagaram tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva sabbasantharim avasathagaram santharitva asanani pannapetva udakamanikam patitthapetva telappadipam aropetva yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthamsu. Ekamantam thita kho pataligamiya upasaka bhagavantam etadavocum:
ud8.6:2.2: “sabbasantharisanthatam, bhante, avasathagaram; asanani pannattani; udakamaniko patitthapito telappadipo aropito.
ud8.6:3.1: Atha kho bhagava nivasetva pattacivaramadaya saddhim bhikkhusanghena yena avasathagaram tenupasankami; upasankamitva pade pakkhaletva avasathagaram pavisitva majjhimam thambham nissaya puratthabhimukho nisidi.
ud8.6:3.2: Bhikkhusanghopi kho pade pakkhaletva avasathagaram pavisitva pacchimam bhittim nissaya puratthabhimukho nisidi bhagavantamyeva purakkhatva.
ud8.6:3.3: Pataligamiyapi kho upasaka pade pakkhaletva avasathagaram pavisitva puratthimam bhittim nissaya pacchimabhimukha nisidimsu bhagavantamyeva purakkhatva.
ud8.6:3.4: Atha kho bhagava pataligamiye upasake amantesi:
ud8.6:4.3: Idha, gahapatayo, dussilo silavipanno pamadadhikaranam mahatim bhogajanim nigacchati.
ud8.6:5.1: Puna caparam, gahapatayo, dussilassa silavipannassa papako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
ud8.6:6.1: Puna caparam, gahapatayo, dussilo silavipanno yannadeva parisam upasankamati—yadi khattiyaparisam, yadi brahmanaparisam, yadi gahapatiparisam, yadi samanaparisam—avisarado upasankamati mankubhuto.
ud8.6:7.1: Puna caparam, gahapatayo, dussilo silavipanno sammulho kalam karoti.
ud8.6:8.1: Puna caparam, gahapatayo, dussilo silavipanno kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati.
ud8.6:8.3: Ime kho, gahapatayo, panca adinava dussilassa silavipattiya.
ud8.6:9.3: Idha, gahapatayo, silava silasampanno appamadadhikaranam mahantam bhogakkhandham adhigacchati.
ud8.6:10.1: Puna caparam, gahapatayo, silavato silasampannassa kalyano kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
ud8.6:11.1: Puna caparam, gahapatayo, silava silasampanno yannadeva parisam upasankamati—yadi khattiyaparisam, yadi brahmanaparisam, yadi gahapatiparisam, yadi samanaparisam—visarado upasankamati amankubhuto.
ud8.6:12.1: Puna caparam, gahapatayo, silava silasampanno asammulho kalam karoti.
ud8.6:13.1: Puna caparam, gahapatayo, silava silasampanno kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati.
ud8.6:13.3: Ime kho, gahapatayo, panca anisamsa silavato silasampadaya”ti.
ud8.6:14.1: Atha kho bhagava pataligamiye upasake bahudeva rattim dhammiya kathaya sandassetva samadapetva samuttejetva sampahamsetva uyyojesi:
ud8.6:14.2: “abhikkanta kho, gahapatayo, ratti; yassadani tumhe kalam mannatha”ti
ud8.6:14.3: Atha kho pataligamiya upasaka bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkamimsu.
ud8.6:14.4: Atha kho bhagava acirapakkantesu pataligamiyesu upasakesu sunnagaram pavisi.
ud8.6:15.1: Tena kho pana samayena sunidhavassakara magadhamahamatta pataligame nagaram mapenti vajjinam patibahaya.
ud8.6:15.2: Tena kho pana samayena sambahula devatayo sahassasahasseva pataligame vatthuni parigganhanti.
ud8.6:15.3: Yasmim padese mahesakkha devata vatthuni parigganhanti mahesakkhanam tattha rannam rajamahamattanam cittani namanti nivesanani mapetum.
ud8.6:15.4: Yasmim padese majjhima devata vatthuni parigganhanti majjhimanam tattha rannam rajamahamattanam cittani namanti nivesanani mapetum.
ud8.6:15.5: Yasmim padese nica devata vatthuni parigganhanti nicanam tattha rannam rajamahamattanam cittani namanti nivesanani mapetum.
ud8.6:16.1: Addasa kho bhagava dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena ta devatayo sahassasahasseva pataligame vatthuni parigganhantiyo.
ud8.6:16.2: Yasmim padese mahesakkha devata vatthuni parigganhanti, mahesakkhanam tattha rannam rajamahamattanam cittani namanti nivesanani mapetum.
ud8.6:16.3: Yasmim padese majjhima devata vatthuni parigganhanti, majjhimanam tattha rannam rajamahamattanam cittani namanti nivesanani mapetum.
ud8.6:16.4: Yasmim padese nica devata vatthuni parigganhanti, nicanam tattha rannam rajamahamattanam cittani namanti nivesanani mapetum.
ud8.6:16.5: Atha kho bhagava tassa rattiya paccusasamaye paccutthaya ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
ud8.6:17.1: “Ke nu kho, ananda, pataligame nagaram mapenti”ti.
ud8.6:17.2: “Sunidhavassakara, bhante, magadhamahamatta pataligame nagaram mapenti vajjinam patibahaya”ti.
ud8.6:17.4: evamevam kho, ananda, sunidhavassakara magadhamahamatta pataligame nagaram mapenti vajjinam patibahaya.
ud8.6:17.5: Idhaham, ananda, addasam dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena sambahula devatayo sahassasahasseva pataligame vatthuni parigganhantiyo.
ud8.6:17.6: Yasmim padese mahesakkha devata vatthuni parigganhanti mahesakkhanam tattha rannam rajamahamattanam cittani namanti nivesanani mapetum.
ud8.6:17.7: Yasmim padese majjhima devata vatthuni parigganhanti majjhimanam tattha rannam rajamahamattanam cittani namanti nivesanani mapetum.
ud8.6:17.8: Yasmim padese nica devata vatthuni parigganhanti nicanam tattha rannam rajamahamattanam cittani namanti nivesanani mapetum.
ud8.6:17.9: Yavata, ananda, ariyam ayatanam yavata vanippatho idam agganagaram bhavissati pataliputtam putabhedanam.
ud8.6:17.10: Pataliputtassa kho, ananda, tayo antaraya bhavissanti—
ud8.6:17.11: aggito va udakato va mithubhedato va”ti.
ud8.6:18.1: Atha kho sunidhavassakara magadhamahamatta yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodimsu.
ud8.6:18.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam atthamsu.
ud8.6:18.3: Ekamantam thita kho sunidhavassakara magadhamahamatta bhagavantam etadavocum:
ud8.6:18.4: “adhivasetu no bhavam gotamo ajjatanaya bhattam saddhim bhikkhusanghena”ti.
ud8.6:19.1: Atha kho sunidhavassakara magadhamahamatta bhagavato adhivasanam viditva yena sako avasatho tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva sake avasathe panitam khadaniyam bhojaniyam patiyadapetva bhagavato kalam arocesum:
ud8.6:20.1: Atha kho bhagava pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya saddhim bhikkhusanghena yena sunidhavassakaranam magadhamahamattanam avasatho tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi.
ud8.6:20.2: Atha kho sunidhavassakara magadhamahamatta buddhappamukham bhikkhusangham panitena khadaniyena bhojaniyena sahattha santappesum sampavaresum.
ud8.6:21.1: Atha kho sunidhavassakara magadhamahamatta bhagavantam bhuttavim onitapattapanim annataram nicam asanam gahetva ekamantam nisidimsu.
ud8.6:21.2: Ekamantam nisinne kho sunidhavassakare magadhamahamatte bhagava imahi gathahi anumodi:
ud8.6:25.1: Atha kho bhagava sunidhavassakaranam magadhamahamattanam imahi gathahi anumoditva utthayasana pakkami.
ud8.6:26.1: Tena kho pana samayena sunidhavassakara magadhamahamatta bhagavantam pitthito pitthito anubandha honti:
ud8.6:26.2: “yenajja samano gotamo dvarena nikkhamissati tam gotamadvaram nama bhavissati.
ud8.6:26.3: Yena titthena gangam nadim tarissati tam gotamatittham nama bhavissati”ti.
ud8.6:27.1: Atha kho bhagava yena dvarena nikkhami tam gotamadvaram nama ahosi.
ud8.6:27.2: Atha kho bhagava yena ganga nadi tenupasankami.
ud8.6:27.3: Tena kho pana samayena ganga nadi pura hoti samatittika kakapeyya.
ud8.6:27.4: Appekacce manussa navam pariyesanti, appekacce ulumpam pariyesanti, appekacce kullam bandhanti apara param gantukama.
ud8.6:27.5: Atha kho bhagava—seyyathapi nama balava puriso saminjitam va baham pasareyya, pasaritam va baham saminjeyya; evamevam—gangaya nadiya orimatire antarahito parimatire paccutthasi saddhim bhikkhusanghena.
ud8.6:28.1: Addasa kho bhagava te manusse appekacce navam pariyesante, appekacce ulumpam pariyesante, appekacce kullam bandhante apara param gantukame.
ud8.6:29.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
